verses.text: \w And|strong="H5869"\w* lifting \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* measuring-line \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* hand.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* angel \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* talking \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* went \w out|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* another angel went \w out|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w*, meeting \w him|strong="H7200"\w*,

\w Said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* quickly \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H0428"\w* young \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, Jerusalem \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* unwalled town, \w because|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* great number \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* cattle \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w*, says \w the|strong="H7200"\w* Lord, \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* wall \w of|strong="H0376"\w* fire round \w about|strong="H5375"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* glory \w inside|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*.

Ho, ho! \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* flight \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H0753"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* north, \w says|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w far|strong="H4100"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w wide|strong="H7341"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* four winds \w of|strong="H0753"\w* heaven, \w says|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord.

Ho! Zion, \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* flight \w from|strong="H3318"\w* danger, \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w who|strong="H4397"\w* are living \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H4397"\w* Babylon.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H1975"\w* \w is|strong="H0120"\w* \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H3427"\w* armies \w has|strong="H0120"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* way \w of|strong="H3427"\w* glory \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w has|strong="H0120"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* nations \w which|strong="H0929"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* \w taken|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H0413"\w* goods: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w anyone|strong="H0120"\w* touching \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w is|strong="H0120"\w* touching \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H0120"\w* most dear \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* shaking \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* goods \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* servants: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H8432"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* see \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* armies \w has|strong="H3068"\w* sent \w me|strong="H0589"\w*.

Give songs \w of|strong="H0776"\w* joy, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6566"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* come, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* resting-place \w among|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H3427"\w* number \w of|strong="H1323"\w* nations \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* joined \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H4422"\w* day, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* become \w my|strong="H4422"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*; \w and|strong="H1323"\w* I \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H6726"\w*, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w you|strong="H6726"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* see \w that|strong="H4422"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H1323"\w* armies \w has|strong="H0894"\w* sent me \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Judah \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord's heritage \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holy land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3519"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w again|strong="H7971"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* flesh \w be|strong="H1961"\w* quiet \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* no sound \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* awake \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* holy resting-place.
